thread.title: Kim Kardashian Puts Baby Shower on Hold After Lamar Odom's Hospitalization
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Puts Baby Shower on Hold After Lamar Odom's Hospitalization

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Kim Kardashian Puts Baby Shower on Hold After Lamar Odom's Hospitalization
text:
Comments Kim postpones her weekend baby shower to accompany her sister Khloe Kardashian at Lamar Odom's side in hospital. 
Kim Kardashian 's baby shower has been put on hold as Lamar Odom remains in coma. E! News reports the wife of Kanye West was originally scheduled to celebrate the upcoming arrival of her second child this coming weekend at her friend Alison Azoff's home with a Troop Beverly Hills theme. Lamar Odom was hospitalized in Las Vegas after he was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel. Cocaine and opiates were reportedly found in his system. Khloe Kardashian , who has split from the athlete but is still legally married to him, has been keeping vigil at his bedside in the hospital. Khloe was joined by her family including sisters Kim and Kourtney Kardashian as well as momager Kris Jenner . Lamar's family, ex Liza Morales, and children were there as well. Fellow celebrities and friends like David Beckham , LeBron James , Dwyane Wade , Gabrielle Union , Miles Teller , and Magic Johnson sent prayers to the NBA player on Twitter. In the wake of Lamar Odom's health crisis, Kourney's baby daddy Scott Disick who is also battling similar issues has checked into rehab. He is seeking treatment for drugs and alcohol abuse in a rehabilitation center in Malibu. His addictions are believed to be part of the reason why Kourtney dumped him.
